Name: Biarritz
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry on stick (sail).
Review: Basically a brandy sour with a little something extra from the orange liqueur.
Nutrition: One serving of Biarritz contains 220 calories
